donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
Structures and processes for MDG-based pro-poor policy planning and research supported.

The purpose of the project is to strengthen institutional capacities for results-based monitoring and evaluation of poverty reduction strategies (PRS). 

The Strengthening PRS Monitoring initiative is comprised of the following outputs:

1.	Public spending and allocations in pro-poor sectors reviewed and analyzed through gender lens to better understand the contribution and needs of men and women.
2.	Quality, collection, analysis and management of PRS data improved at national and province levels.
3.	National engagement in PRS monitoring mobilized through participatory processes. 

The monitoring framework is envisaged to ensure an ongoing and sustainable system, developed to deliver timely and reliable data against a set of well-selected indicators, and feed into the policy process whilst engaging both national and sub-national levels.

project_descr: Contribute to MDG-responsive poverty reduction through evidence based poverty policy planning, implementation, monitoring and reporting.
